anya-e0809n2:3: Vaggā bhūmi, purī, macca, catubbaṇṇa, vanādihi;
anya-e0809n2:6: Vasundharā chamā bhūmi, pathavī medanī mahī;
anya-e0809n2:7: Ubbī vasumatī go ku, vasudhā dharaṇī dharā;
anya-e0809n2:8: Puthavī jagatī bhūrī, bhū ca bhūtadharā’ vanī.
anya-e0809n2:10: Khārā tu mattikā ūso, ūsavā tūsaro tisu;
anya-e0809n2:16: Pumbahutte kurū sakkā, kosalā magadhā sivī;
anya-e0809n2:19: Vaṅgā videhā kambojā, maddā bhagga’ṅga sīhaḷā;
anya-e0809n2:22: Loko ca bhuvanaṃ vuttaṃ, deso tu visayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n2:26: Saddalo harite dese, tiṇenā, bhinavena hi.
anya-e0809n2:33: Raṭṭhaṃ tu vijitañcātha, purise setu āliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n2:35: Upāntabhū parisaro, goṭṭhaṃ tu gokulaṃ vajo;
anya-e0809n2:36: Maggo pantho patho addhā, añjasaṃ vaṭumaṃ tathā.
anya-e0809n2:38: Pajjo pajjā…. (ka.), yanañca padavī, vattanī paddhatitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n2:39: Tabbhedā jaṅgha, sakaṭa, maggā te ca mahaddhani.
anya-e0809n2:44: Suppatho tu supantho ca, uppathaṃ tvapathaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n2:46: Chattiṃsaparamāṇūna, meko ṇu ca chattiṃsa te;
anya-e0809n2:47: Tajjārī tāpi chattiṃsa, rathareṇu chattiṃsa te.
anya-e0809n2:49: Likkhātā satta ūkā tā, dhaññamāsoti satta te;
anya-e0809n2:50: Satta ṅgula’ mamu dviccha, vidatthi tā duve siyuṃ.
anya-e0809n2:52: Ratanaṃ tāni satteva, yaṭṭhi tā vīsatū sabhaṃ;
